ygData.subject: patch changes
ygData.msgSnippet: anyone test what this means to us?  i havent played in a few days, prob wont this weekend either; stupid work.  anyway, if i missed anything else in the patch
ygData.messageBody:
anyone test what this means to us? i havent played in a few days, prob wont
this weekend either; stupid work. anyway, if i missed anything else in the
patch message, feel free to mention it.

belphenor

>>*Spell Changes*
>>- Shadow Vortex is now a "drain" spell.
>>- Siphon Strength will now stack with strength buffs and debuffs
>>- Panic the Dead cast and recast delays have been reduced. In >>addition,
>>the spell is less resistable.
